thread.title: CBRE to Offer App for Office Design and Amenities

author: Peter Grant
title: CBRE to Offer App for Office Design and Amenities

organizations.name: office design and amenities cbre group inc.

text:
CBRE Group Inc. has hired a former senior executive at Zipcar Inc. to lead a new high-tech team that will customize apps for tenants and building owners to help them navigate the latest in workplace design and amenities.
Andrew Kupiec, who led North American operations for Zipcar, said the new app will enable office workers to do such things as locate colleagues, navigate buildings, reserve workspaces, learn about area events and order food and beverages. He said he plans to build a “sizable” team partly from the consumer-products... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
